tool_description: EmoDex is a emotion detection tool for texts. Differentiation with 8 emotions.
name: EmoDex Emotions Analysis
title: EmoDex Emotions Analysis

api_list.name: Emotion analysis
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emodex-emotions-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi/emotions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emodex-emotions-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
